terra.name: Terra
terra.description:
User performs a critical attack that ignores Terrain effects.
Can't activate with Adept, Draco or Astra.

Sol.name: Sol
Sol.description:
User restores HP equal to damage dealt.
Can't activate with other skills.

astra.name: Astra
astra.description:
User performs a 5-hit attack if using a pysical melee weapon.
Can't activate with Adept, Draco or Terra.

luna.name: Luna
luna.description:
User negates foe's defence/magical defense.
Can't activate with other skills.

lethality.name: Lethality
lethality.description: User kills foe if using a physical melee weapon and if a critical hit would kill.

adept.name: Adept
adept.description:
User performs a 2-hit attack.
Can't activate with Draco, Terra or Astra.

draco.name: Draco
draco.description:
User does triple damage if using a pysical melee weapon as an infantry unit.
Can't activate with Adept, Terra or Astra.

mug.name: Mug
mug.description: User steals all non ☆ weapons and items from defeated foe. Reduces Hit and Avoid of allies within 3 spaces by 50.

steal.name: Steal
steal.description: User steals a non ☆ weapon or item from foe after combat.

canto.name: Canto
canto.description: User can use left over move after attacking. Only usable by mounted units.

flurry.name: Flurry
flurry.description: User gains the Flurry command. Initiates 2~5 rounds of combat.

dance.name: Dance
dance.description:
User allows an ally to move again.
Cycles between 7 states when used and starts at 0.
State 2 can grant Ensorcel, State 4 can grant Enarmor, State 6 can grant Empower. 
Chances for effects are (Times danced{max 250} - 150)/10

sing.name: Sing
sing.description:
User restores HP of allies and may make them move again.
S = Times sang so far (max 250), HP restored = (S + 5)/50, min 2, Range = (Level/5) +1, max 4, Refresh chance = (S / 50) + 2* (Recieved Support/5) + 10, excludes Plum

warp.name: Warp
warp.description: User can teleport to a traversable space and act afterwards.

summon.name: Summon
summon.description: User can use special summoning staves.

lockpick.name: Lockpick
lockpick.description: User can open doors and chests without keys.

slayer.name: Slayer
slayer.description: User gains +10 Hit and Avoid against monsters.

charisma.name: Charisma
charisma.description: Grants allies within 3 squares +5% Hit and Avoid.

forester.name: Forester
forester.description: Unit gains +10% Hit and Avoid and +1 Move on Forest maps.

grassrunner.name: Grassrunner
grassrunner.description: Unit gains +10% Hit and Avoid and +1 Move on Grass maps.

mountaineer.name: Mountaineer
mountaineer.description: Unit gains +10% Hit and Avoid and +1 Move on Mountain maps.

seafarer.name: Seafarer
seafarer.description: Unit gains +10% Hit and Avoid and +1 Move on Sea maps.

frontiersman.name: Frontiersman
frontiersman.description: Unit gains +10% Hit and Avoid and +1 Move on Frontier maps.

urbanite.name: Urbanite
urbanite.description: Unit gains +10% Hit and Avoid and +1 Move on Castle and Indoor maps.

gladiator.name: Gladiator
gladiator.description: Unit gains +10% Hit and Avoid in Arenas.
